    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

riday, July 13, 2001 11:10 PM
    Subject: Re: Iron Fist


    OOC: I copie=
d and pasted Kyle Stewart's post below. I marked it with red and bold.


  =
  ______________________________________________


    My messages haven't =
been getting through so:

    1.Mustex and Stallex
    Location:Northern Ch=
ad
    Status:Traveling
    Destination:Egypt
    ETA:22 hours

     Mustex=
 and Stallex duel. Their double-bladed swords
    slice the air. It is
    =
sparring, but one mistake still means death. Stallex
    is by far the more=

    talented fighter, but he can not match his father in
    strength and =
speed, so
    Mustex continues pushing Stallex back. Mustex gets a
    good=
 blow to Stallex's
    chest. Stallex buckles under the pain.
    Mustex:Wh=
y did you stop?
    Stallex:It hurts.
    Mustex:Don't stop. If you don't g=
ive into the pain it
    will hurt 10 times
    more. If you give into the =
pain you're enemy will see
    that it hurts 100 times
    more. I've seen =
alot of bots fall from that mistake.
    Alot of bots wouldn't
    have bot=
hered teaching you that. Now back to beast
    mode.
    Stallex:Beast Mode=
!
    Mustex:Beast Mode!
    Stallex:Internal repairs.
     They begin to r=
un off. The two horses run quickly
    over the desert.
    Stallex:What's =
our next mission.
    Mustex:Yours is in "Training City". There's a monkey
=
    there named Rhesus. He's
    an old friend and he can teach you about s=
tealth.
    Stallex:What about you?
    Mustex:I have a plan to take out th=
e "Iron Fist", but
    it's a 1 bot job.
    Stallex:You know how dangerous=
 that is.
    Mustex:Yes but  it's even harder for 2 bots to
    infiltrate=
. I have a shot
    alone though.
    Stallex:O.k., but come back alive. I =
want to be the
    one to beat you.
     They run off on their way to Egypt=
.

    2.Mustex and Stallex
    Location:Training City,Egypt
    Status:Pre=
paration

     Mustex and Stallex walk into a room. Rhesus is
    sitting a=
t a desk with his
    back to them. He is leaning over some circuits
    ex=
amining them. Mustex has his
    hands behind his back and is wearing his p=
oker face.
    He knows the following
    conversation will be a simple mat=
ter of wearing down
    Rhesus who is completely
    oblivious to them.
   =
 Mustex:Rhesus!
     Rhesus jumps. Mustex walks around in front of him.
   =
 Mustex:Still wasting precious Maximal computer space
    on your own priva=
te
    casino my,my,my. Stallex go start training with
    drones,Rhesus wi=
ll be with
    you soon.
     Stallex walks out.
    Rhesus:Ahh,my good fri=
end. So the "Carnitrons" rise
    again. I can hear the cry
    "Carnitrons=
 Carnivate". We were the only sensible
    group. We had a simple
    motto=
 of "stay alive".
    Mustex:Shutup! If we were so great then why did I lea=
d
    us to get ambushed by
    the "Alliance" for our first battle. As I r=
ecall 5 of
    the 7 of us were
    damaged beyond repair. Now I see that a=
nything except
    a 2-way war leads to
    extra senseless casulties. That=
's why I intend to make
    everyone pick Maximal
    or Predicon. All you =
can think about is revenge on the
    "Alliance",and the
    rebirth of a l=
ost cause. All I want is these parts and
    a transport.
     Mustex hands=
 Rhesus a paper. Rhesus looks upset as he
    reads it.
    Rhesus:Where am=
 I going to get a D.N.A. simulator.
    Mustex:You're a bigger fool than I =
thought if you
    think I don't know where
    Fox Fingers got his.
    Rh=
esus:Even so it will take me several weeks, but pay
    could speed me up.
=
    Mustex:Did I mention I'm planning to take out the
    "Iron Fist" the A=
lliance
    will be permantly crippled.
    Rhesus:Well in that case just l=
et me step into the
    next toom to get what you
    need. So,we can final=
ly get revenge for Croctas,
    Kangato, Tigecs, Socrow, and
    my lovely =
Monkessa. I've just finished about half a
    dozen special
    hover-cycle=
s. They should do fine for you.
    Mustex:Oh, and by the way I told my son=
 you'd train
    him.
    Rhesus:Small price to pay. Does he know about the=

    "Carnitrons" yet.
    Mustex:Not a clue.
    Rhesus:Don't worry I won'=
t snich 'till you come to
    your senses.
     Rhesus hands Mustex a large=
 box of parts and walks
    away to train Stallex.

    3.Mustex
    Locati=
on:Training City,Egypt
    Status:Traveling
    Destination:Alliance Island=
,Spain
    ETA:5 hours

    Rhesus:Come back alive. You know I can't restar=
t the
    "Carnitrons" without
    you.
    Mustex:You're not going to resa=
rt them with or without
    me.
    Rhesus:I'll take good care of the kid..=
. Uh,that is
    until you get back.
    Mustex:bye
     Mustex jumps onto =
his waiting hover-cycle and races
    off.

    4.Mustex
    Location:Allia=
nce Island, Spain
    Status:Infiltration

     Mustex looks at the newly c=
ompleted drone in front of
    him. He activates
    the D.N.A. simulator. =
The drone takes on his
    appearance. He is positioned 500
    yards from =
the "Iron Fist" so the Alliance won't risk
    an attack unless he
    gets=
 closer. He activates another pocket sized drone.
    It begins its mission=

    to plant a device he had built 100 yards from the
    base, 40 feet un=
der. When
    his monitor says the drone is done he calls out the
    code =
that will activate
    the drones programming.
    Mustex:Beast Mode!
     =
Mustex turns on his jammer and attaches it to his
    belt. The drone begin=
s
    transmitting a Maximal  frequency,goes to Beast
    Mode,and bounds f=
or the base.
    Mustex keeps low to the ground so he won't be spotted.
   =
 The auto-guns begin
    firing, but no transformers come out. The horse ju=
mps
    away from every shot.
    He stops at 100 yards away.
    Drone:Mus=
tex Maximize!
     The drone transforms and begins firing arrows at the
   =
 shield of the base. He
    dodges all the beams,but only has enough power =
at this
    kind of level for 15
    minutes. Fortunately,he doesn't need t=
hat long. The
    main turrets fireand take
    him out. The shields flicke=
r from power loss,but stay
    intact. Mustex then
    smiles when his moni=
tor shows the pocket sized drone
    the pocket sized drone
    has reached=
 the surface. He activates the device and
    it transmites a Maximal
    f=
requency. The drone then starts firing. It has enough
    power for 6 shots=
. The
    "Alliance" is beginning to sweat. The main turret
    fires again=
 and the shield
    goes down. Mustex deactivates th device and charges.
  =
  Mustex:Beast Mode!
     As he charges he scans the base. The shields will=
 be
    down for the next hour.
    It will be down for the next hour. It w=
ill take him 10
    minutes to navigate
    the corridors to his destinatio=
n and 10 minutes to get
    back. He will go in
    the  one way they won't=
 expect,The Front Door, 10
    yards away he transforms.
    Mustex:Mustex =
Maximize!
     Mustex draws a cyber arrow and blows the door open.
    Usin=
g his frequency
    jammer as cover he sneaks to his destination. He walks
=
    into the Energon
    storage room. The Energon will magnify the explosi=
on
    of the small explosive
    he made. He walks over to a computer cons=
ole and hooks
    it up to the
    "Alliance" network. If a remote connecti=
on is placed
    on it it will blow from
    2 connections to the network. =
It can detect the
    Energon and will blow if much
    is removed. It can =
detect the energon in the room and
    will blow if to much is
    removed.=
 It takes 20 minutes to diffuse and it would
    be set for 15. There is
  =
  no deactivation code. The full blast could probably
    not be contained.=
 Even if
    the explosive is covered an electronic signal will
    ignite =
the energon. He set
    it and ran out.

                CHECK! Your move Z=
ardus(feel free to
                 head for your time machine this
       =
           qualifies as a catastophe).
